pages.text: Eoandromeda is an ediacaran organism consisting of 8 radial spiral arms curved in a circular shape. It bears resemblance to ctenophores and echinoderms but there is insufficient evidence to classify the animal.
$(l)Eats:$() N/A$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Reproductive Blob$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
